markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Group Impression](/Feats.aspx?ID=5155) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 256 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6)

</column>

---

When you Make an Impression, you can compare your Diplomacy check result to the Will DCs of up to 10 targets you conversed with, with no penalty. The number of targets increases to 20 if you’re an expert, 50 if you’re a master, and 100 if you’re legendary.
name: Group Impression

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Group Impression Source Player Core pg. 256 2.0 Prerequisites Trained in Diplomacy --- When you Make an Impression, you can compare your Diplomacy check result to the Will DCs of up to 10 targets you conversed with, with no penalty. The number of targets increases to 20 if you’re an expert, 50 if you’re a master, and 100 if you’re legendary.
